abstract: A mutable caption subclass that you use to create new captions.

# AVMutableCaption

**Class**

A mutable caption subclass that you use to create new captions.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMutableCaption
```

## Configuring text and timing

- **text**: The caption text.
- **timeRange**: The time range over which the system presents the caption.

## Configuring the region

- **region**: The region in which the caption exists.

## Configuring font styles

- **AVCaption.FontStyle**: Font styles for caption text.
- **setFontStyle(_:in:)**: Sets the font style for a range of text.
- **removeFontStyle(in:)**: Removes a font style from a range of text.
- **AVCaption.FontWeight**: Font weights for a caption.
- **setFontWeight(_:in:)**: Sets the font weight for a range of text.
- **removeFontWeight(in:)**: Removes a font weight from a range of text.
- **AVCaption.Decoration**: Text decorations for caption text.
- **setDecoration(_:in:)**: Sets a decoration for a range of text.
- **removeDecoration(in:)**: Removes a decoration from a range of text.

## Configuring colors

- **setTextColor(_:in:)**: Sets the text color for a range of text.
- **removeTextColor(in:)**: Removes the text color for a range of text.
- **setBackgroundColor(_:in:)**: Sets the background color for a range of text.
- **removeBackgroundColor(in:)**: Removes a background color from a range of text.

## Configuring alignment

- **textAlignment**: The alignment of the caption text.
- **AVCaption.TextAlignment**: Text alignment options for a caption.

## Configuring animation

- **animation**: Animations to apply to the caption text.
- **AVCaption.Animation**: Animation options for a caption.

## Configuring advanced typography

- **AVCaption.Ruby**: An object that presents ruby characters.
- **setRuby(_:in:)**: Sets ruby text for a range.
- **removeRuby(in:)**: Removes ruby text from a range.
- **AVCaption.TextCombine**: The caption’s supported rendering policy options.
- **setTextCombine(_:in:)**: Sets text combine for a range.
- **removeTextCombine(in:)**: Removes text combine from a range.

## Captions

- **AVCaption**: An object that represents text to present over a time range.

## Inherits From

- AVCaption

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSMutableCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
